text: Everyone has to address [Name] as Master
[Name] is the impolite one! Keep your elbows on the table until told otherwise!
YOU SHALL NOT...TOUCH THE TABLE. - Every time someone touches the table, they have to do 5 squats.
[Name] is now forbidden to pronounce any vowel until further notice!
[Name] has to speak in a funny accent until told otherwise
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else has to do a silly dance
[Name] can only communicate through hand gestures until further notice
Every time [Name] speaks, everyone has to do 5 burpees.
[Name] has to wear a funny hat for the rest of the game
